com.sri.ai.grinder.rewriter.api

Interface TopRewriter

UnionOfSetsEqualEmptySetTopRewriter
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface TopRewriter
extends Rewriter
    An indicator interface for rewriters that are either a Switch rewriter, or a CombiningTopRewriter (an extension of FirstOf) rewriter with base top rewriters, or a basic rewriter that typically will not recurse. The name "top rewriter" comes from the fact that these only apply once to the "top expression" of an expression; that is, they do no recurse, and do not apply multiple times, automatically (although their inner user-defined code may do that). They are meant as "atomic" rewriters that may be provided to recursive and exhaustive rewriters.
    Author:
    braz

      • makeTopRewriterFromTopRewritersThatAreEitherFirstOfOrSwitches

        static <T> TopRewriter makeTopRewriterFromTopRewritersThatAreEitherFirstOfOrSwitches(java.util.List<? extends TopRewriter> topRewritersThatAreEitherFirstOfOrSwitches)
        Takes a list of TopRewriters, then determines a list of Switch rewriters, each of them the merge of all Switch rewriters with the same key maker (from Switch.merge(List). If this list contains more than one Switch rewriter, returns a CombiningTopRewriter rewriter with them as base rewriters. If this list contains only one Switch rewriter, returns it.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of keys in the switch rewriters.
        Parameters:
        topRewritersThatAreEitherFirstOfOrSwitches -
        Returns:
